verses.text: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* spurned \w and|strong="H1732"\w* broken \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, routing \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* wrath – restore \w us|strong="H5921"\w*!
\w You|strong="H7725"\w* \w have|strong="H8147"\w* shaken \w the|strong="H5221"\w* land \w and|strong="H7725"\w* cleft \w it|strong="H7725"\w*; heal \w its|strong="H7725"\w* tottering breaches.
\w You|strong="H7725"\w* have \w made|strong="H6555"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* people drink hardship, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* given \w us|strong="H7725"\w* wine \w of|strong="H7725"\w* reeling.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* given \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* fear \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* banner, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* rallying-place from \w the|strong="H3588"\w* bow, \qs Selah\qs*

\w for|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* rescue \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* beloved. Save \w by|strong="H5971"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* right hand \w and|strong="H5971"\w* answer \w us|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w God|strong="H5414"\w* did solemnly swear: “\w As|strong="H6440"\w* victor \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w divide|strong="H5414"\w* Shechem, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* mete \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* valley \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Succoth.

Mine \w is|strong="H3225"\w* Gilead, mine \w is|strong="H3225"\w* Manasseh, Ephraim \w is|strong="H3225"\w* \w the|strong="H3467"\w* defence \w of|strong="H3225"\w* \w my|strong="H3467"\w* head, Judah \w my|strong="H3467"\w* sceptre \w of|strong="H3225"\w* rule,

Moab \w the|strong="H1696"\w* pot \w that|strong="H6944"\w* I wash \w in|strong="H1696"\w*, Edom – I cast \w my|strong="H1696"\w* shoe over \w it|strong="H1696"\w*, I shout \w o|strong="H3068"\w*’er Philistia \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w triumph|strong="H5937"\w*.”

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3063"\w* \w be|strong="H3063"\w* brought \w to|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H4519"\w* fortified city! \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3063"\w* \w be|strong="H3063"\w* led \w into|strong="H3063"\w* Edom!

\w Have|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* not spurned \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God? \w You|strong="H5921"\w* do not march \w forth|strong="H7993"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* armies.
Grant us help \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* foe, \w for|strong="H5704"\w* human help \w is|strong="H4310"\w* worthless.

\w With|strong="H3318"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w yet|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H3318"\w* bravely: \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w himself|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H6635"\w* tread down \w our|strong="H3318"\w* foes.
